attributes.action: intoduce refunable deposits on all recyclable products and require manufacturers to accept returns.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We should forget fining people who won't recycle and instead develop a culture of returning used products to where they originated from by using deposits.
Supermarkets could give vouchers against new items on return of empties, which in turn would be sent back to factories for recycling when new deliveries received, newspapers back to the newsagent to recycle etc.
It worked for pop bottles, and for those who can't be bothered, children will enjoy collecting for pocket money.
